57#include <openssl/asn1.h>
58#include <openssl/digest.h>
59#include <openssl/err.h>
60#include <openssl/evp.h>
61#include <openssl/mem.h>
62#include <openssl/obj.h>
63#include <openssl/x509.h>
64
65#include "internal.h"
66
67int ASN1_item_sign(const ASN1_ITEM *it, X509_ALGOR *algor1,
68 X509_ALGOR *algor2, ASN1_BIT_STRING *signature, void *asn,
69 EVP_PKEY *pkey, const EVP_MD *type)
70{
71 EVP_MD_CTX ctx;
72 EVP_MD_CTX_init(&ctx);
73 if (!EVP_DigestSignInit(&ctx, NULL, type, NULL, pkey)) {
74 EVP_MD_CTX_cleanup(&ctx);
75 return 0;
76 }
77 return ASN1_item_sign_ctx(it, algor1, algor2, signature, asn, &ctx);
78}
79
80int ASN1_item_sign_ctx(const ASN1_ITEM *it,
81 X509_ALGOR *algor1, X509_ALGOR *algor2,
82 ASN1_BIT_STRING *signature, void *asn, EVP_MD_CTX *ctx)
83{
84 EVP_PKEY *pkey;
85 unsigned char *buf_in = NULL, *buf_out = NULL;
86 size_t inl = 0, outl = 0;
87
88 pkey = EVP_PKEY_CTX_get0_pkey(ctx->pctx);
89
90 /* Write out the requested copies of the AlgorithmIdentifier. */
91 if (algor1 && !x509_digest_sign_algorithm(ctx, algor1)) {
92 goto err;
93 }
94 if (algor2 && !x509_digest_sign_algorithm(ctx, algor2)) {
95 goto err;
96 }
97
98 inl = ASN1_item_i2d(asn, &buf_in, it);
99 outl = EVP_PKEY_size(pkey);
100 buf_out = OPENSSL_malloc((unsigned int)outl);
101 if ((buf_in == NULL) || (buf_out == NULL)) {
102 outl = 0;
103 OPENSSL_PUT_ERROR(X509, ERR_R_MALLOC_FAILURE);
104 goto err;
105 }
106
107 if (!EVP_DigestSign(ctx, buf_out, &outl, buf_in, inl)) {
108 outl = 0;
109 OPENSSL_PUT_ERROR(X509, ERR_R_EVP_LIB);
110 goto err;
111 }
112 if (signature->data != NULL)
113 OPENSSL_free(signature->data);
114 signature->data = buf_out;
115 buf_out = NULL;
116 signature->length = outl;
117 /*
118 * In the interests of compatibility, I'll make sure that the bit string
119 * has a 'not-used bits' value of 0
120 */
121 signature->flags &= ~(ASN1_STRING_FLAG_BITS_LEFT | 0x07);
122 signature->flags |= ASN1_STRING_FLAG_BITS_LEFT;
123 err:
124 EVP_MD_CTX_cleanup(ctx);
125 OPENSSL_free(buf_in);
126 OPENSSL_free(buf_out);
127 return (outl);
128}
